attributes.action: Recognise Pastafarianism as an official religion
attributes.background: Pastafarianism is the belief that the universe was created 5,000 years ago by the Flying Spaghetti Monster. It is the most peaceful religion in the world having caused exactly zero wars and no deaths have been caused by this religion.

rejection.details:
Petitions have to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure what you mean by "recognise as an official religion". There is no list of "official religions" kept by the Government.

You could start a new petition clearly setting out the action you would like to see happen.
